SEARCH
Package suggestions

Interface SuggestionView

All Known Implementing Classes:
StudentCommittee
public interface SuggestionView
This class implements all methods that pertain to viewing Suggestions.

  • Method Summary

    Static Methods
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static List<Suggestion>
    findEditableSuggestions(Student student, SuggestionStatus sStatus)
    Fetches all Suggestions that a Student can edit.
    Only PENDING Suggestions can be edited.
    static Suggestion
    selectSuggestion(Student student, SuggestionStatus sStatus)
    Method to select a Suggestion.
    static String
    singleSuggestionToString(Suggestion suggestion)
    Returns a preview of a Suggestion to a String.
    static void
    viewEditableSuggestions(Student student, SuggestionStatus sStatus)
    Prints the Suggestions that are editable.

  • Method Details

    • singleSuggestionToString

      static String singleSuggestionToString(Suggestion suggestion)
      Returns a preview of a Suggestion to a String. Can be displayed or printed to report.
      Outputs the following: Suggestion Author (faculty)
      Suggestion body text
      Suggestion Category
      SuggestionStatus of the Suggestion
      Parameters:
      suggestion - Suggestion to be output
      Returns:
      Readable string output of the suggestion

    • findEditableSuggestions

      static List<Suggestion> findEditableSuggestions(Student student, SuggestionStatus sStatus)
      Fetches all Suggestions that a Student can edit.
      Only PENDING Suggestions can be edited.
      Parameters:
      student - Student whose Suggestions to fetch from
      sStatus - SuggestionStatus to match. Should be filled with PENDING, but left here for extendability.
      Returns:
      List of Suggestions that suit the parameters

    • viewEditableSuggestions

      static void viewEditableSuggestions(Student student, SuggestionStatus sStatus)
      Prints the Suggestions that are editable. Calls findEditableSuggestions.
      Gives each found Suggestion an index to select from selectSuggestion()
      Parameters:
      student - Student to show editable suggestions
      sStatus - SuggestionStatus to match. Should be filled with PENDING, but left here for extendability.

    • selectSuggestion

      static Suggestion selectSuggestion(Student student, SuggestionStatus sStatus)
      Method to select a Suggestion. The user should see the list from viewEditableSuggestions() first.
      Reads an integer and selects the Suggestion that corresponds to it.
      Parameters:
      student - Student to search for Suggestions
      sStatus - SuggestionStatus to match.
      Returns:
      Suggestion that the user has selected
